revised_title: Pion-Nucleon Scattering and Excited Nucleon States: A Review of the Study of Pion-Nucleon Interaction
tldr: This article discusses pion-nucleon scattering and excited nucleon states, focusing on the study of pion-nucleon interaction. The author highlights the importance of understanding resonance states and the role of symmetry in physics. The article also emphasizes the significance of detailed experiments in the study of scattering.
